game.noActivities: Once you have scheduled an offered activity, the relevant activity dates are displayed here.
game.noOffers: Activity recommendations and invitations from the campaign leader, from the YOUPERS coach, and from your co-workers are displayed here.
game.noClosedEvents: Once you have reported a scheduled activity event as carried out or missed, the corresponding appointment is displayed as completed activity here.
game.noDismissedOffers: If you dismiss an offered activity, it will be displayed here.
